DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect low-sodium , high-potassium condiment salt blood pressure untreated ( pre ) hypertensive Vietnamese adult .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Low Sodium-High Potassium Salt Blood Pressure Vietnamese Adults
DOC.criteria: Untreated prehypertension mild hypertension ( systolic BP 130 160 mmHg and/or diastolic BP 85 100 mmHg ) base mean two measurement 1week interval Diagnosed selfreported cardiovascular disease Diagnosed selfreported kidney disease
